mapper.select: SELECT A.CTKEY , A.LAKEY , A.DEPTKEY , A.SHOPID , A.SHOPNAME , A.OPENTIME , A.STARTTIME , A.CLOSETIME , A.TEL , A.ZIPCODE1 , A.ZIPCODE2 , A.ADDRESS , A.SHOPPRESENT , (SELECT IMGURL FROM TSE_INFO_IMG B WHERE B.REFERID = A.SHOPID) AS STORE_IMGURL FROM TSE_MST_SHOP A WHERE A.CTKEY = #{CTKEY}
